description:
Recycled boardshorts that will keep you comfy from your first wave, right through sitting on your tailgate with a well-earned refreshment. Whether you’re working on your pop-up, or hanging 10, the Hydropeak boardshorts have a mechanical 4-way stretch that moves with you.

  • Recycled polyester blend has an easy 4-way stretch
  • PFC-free DWR finish helps you shorts shake of water and drastically reduces drying times
  • Contoured waistband and drawcord help you find your perfect fit
  • Rear pocket has a key loop and drainage
name: Patagonia Hydropeak 18 Inch Boardshorts - Men's
